altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: 30MS AROUND!

description.en:
"30MS 4-panel comic begins!"
Enjoy the relaxed everyday life of the sisters ✨

Official 4Koma posted on the 30 Minutes Sisters Twitter: https://x.com/30msisters
Also available on the Bandai Hobby Site: https://bandai-hobby.net/site/30minutes_sisters/extra/around/

altTitles.zh: 黑暗召唤师在地下恋爱中

altTitles.zh-ro: Hēi'àn zhàohuàn shī zài dìxià liàn'ài zhōng

altTitles.ja: I'm dating a Dark Summoner

altTitles.vi: Hẹn hò cùng hắc thuật sư

description.en: Amona, a dark summoner and demi-human who uses demonic powers, is the newest addition to the party of the uptight priest Roni. Everyone expected the two to dislike each other and to have nothing to do with each other. But to their surprise, on their first day together as an adventuring party, they had a one-night stand...!
description.ja: クソ真面目な神官・ロニのパーティに新しく加入してきたのは、悪魔の力を使うダークサモナーで亜人のアモナ。反発し合い犬猿の仲になると思われた二人だったが、なんとパーティ加入初日に朝チュンしてしまい…！？

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

altTitles.vi: Ta Trời Sinh Đã Là Nhân Vật Phản Diện

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

title.en: 6-nin no Shinanai Shoujo to Kanarazu Shinu Unmei no Hito

altTitles.ja: 6人の死なない少女と必ず死ぬ運命の人

altTitles.en: 6 Immortal Girls and The Man Destined to Die

description.en:
"I prayed to a god to have a girlfriend, and now I have to die and restart over and over again!?"

Follow the guy who is destined to die among the six heroines!
description.ja: 「彼女が欲しい」と神に願ったら何度も死んでやり直すことに!?６人のヒロインの中から必ず死ぬ運命の人を探し出せ！

altTitles.ja: ゴミ屋敷の鎌倉さん

altTitles.ja-ro: Gomiyashiki no Kamakura-san

description.en:
Exhausted by his job, Kamakura shut himself in a house overflowing with garbage.
But his time, which stopped on "that day", started moving forward once again when a neighbor he had never spoken to before stepped into his house.

A good-natured neighbor x a traumatised resident of a dirty room
Boys' love tale of rescue and rehabilitation drawn by a genius newcomer.

altTitles.ja: スプラトゥーン

altTitles.ja-ro: Supurato~ūn

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

altTitles.ja: とある科学の心理掌握

altTitles.ar: مانجا الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي - مينتل-آوت

description.ar:
هذه القصة الفرعية من سلسلة توارو ببطولة الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي

اقتربت انتخابات مجلس طلاب توكيواداي. شوكهو ميساكي، وهي صاحبة أكبر زمرة في المدرسة، دخلت الانتخابات غريمةً لنائبة رئيسة المجلس ومتحدية لها. وأثناء الانتخابات دخل [أثرٌ] مُعَيّن مدرسة البنات المخمليات، ويدعي أنه المصنف الأول السابق...؟!
description.en: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
description.id: Pemilihan presiden dewan siswa Tokiwadai semakin mendekat. Shokuhou Misaki, salah satu kandidat utama, tengah berada dalam kampanye pemilihan meskipun tidak sesuai ekspektasinya sendiri karena pengaruh orang-orang di sekitarnya dan takdir menjadi kepala kelompok terbesar...!!
description.ru: Приближаются выборы в студенческий совет Токивадая. Шокухо Мисаки, одна из ведущих кандидатов, находится в разгаре избирательной кампании, несмотря на ее собственные ожидания из-за окружающих ее людей и судьбы быть главой крупнейшей клики!..

title.en: The Possesive Tyrant and His Sleepy Cat

altTitles.ko: 매일 밤 집착폭군과 잠드는 고양이가 되었다

altTitles.pt-br: O tirano possessivo e a gata sonolenta

altTitles.en: I Became a Cat That Sleeps with an Obsessive Tyrant Every Night

altTitles.zh: 占有欲强的暴君和他的磕睡小猫

altTitles.es-la: Me volví una gata que duerme con un tirano obsesivo todas las noches

description.en:
I've found myself trapped in a mature-rated novel as a cursed cat, whose mere existence is believed to be harmful to the empire. This place has killed every cat in every alley all because of one prophecy...
The moment anyone finds me will be my last moment in this life.
"What's this?"
Before I could even think of escaping, the male lead, who's fated to become a mad tyrant, effortlessly snatches me up.
description.pt-br: Eu me vi presa em um romance adulto como uma gata amaldiçoada, cuja mera existência é considerada prejudicial ao império. Este lugar matou todos os gatos em todos os becos, tudo por causa de uma profecia… O momento em que alguém me encontrar será meu último momento nesta vida. “O que é isso?” Antes que eu pudesse pensar em escapar, o protagonista masculino, que está fadado a se tornar um tirano louco, me agarra sem esforço.

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.en: I Am The Top Ranker Newbie

altTitles.th: ผู้เล่นหน้าใหม่เลเวลแมกซ์

altTitles.ja: 俺だけレベルMAXなビギナー

description.de: Jin Hyuk ist Streamer und der einzige, der das Ende des Virtual-Reality-Spiels „Turm der Prüfungen“ erlebt hat. Da das Spiel jedoch immer mehr an Beliebtheit verliert, wird auch seine Streamer-Karriere immer hoffnungsloser. Doch eines Tages wird „Turm der Prüfungen" plötzlich zur Realität und die Welt steht vor dem Abgrund. Jin Hyuk, der sich im Spiel besser auskennt als jeder andere, wird zwangsläufig zur letzten Hoffnung der Menschheit!
description.en:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower. 

"It’s time to show everyone what a hardcore gamer can do!"
description.fr: Le jeu de réalité virtuelle "La Tour de l'Épreuve" est officiellement démodé et le streamer Jinhyuk est le seul à être resté jusqu'au bout pour terminer le jeu. Quand un jour "La Tour de l'Épreuve" devient réalité, Jinhyuk qui connaît les éléments du jeu mieux que personne aura forcément un grand avantage sur les autres !
description.id: Jinhyuk, satu-satunya pemain game [MENARA UJIAN] yang menyelesaikan sampai akhir meski popularitas game telah menurun. Hingga suatu hari [MENARA UJIAN] menjadi kenyataan, Jinhyuk harus menyelesaikannya dengan segala elemen yang ia ketahui tentang game ini!
description.ja: ゲーム実況ストリーマーとして活動している主人公・鈴木裕人（すずきひろと）。彼は、万人があきらめたクソゲー『試練の塔』を挑戦しクリアした唯一のプレイヤーであった。念願のエンディングを見ることができたものの、もう誰も興味をもたないこのゲームはサービス終了が確実視されていた…。11年もかけクソゲーをクリアした裕人はこれを機に現実と向き合い、ゲーム実況者としての生活を終わらせることを決心した—。が次の日、現実世界に異変が起きる。街中に突如現れた不吉な塔、そして人類に課される生死をかけた試練。それはまさに裕人が11年の月日を費やしクリアした『試練の塔』そのものであった。塔の攻略法を把握している裕人はその経験を活かし、誰よりも強い最強のビギナーとしてあらたな試練に挑む！
description.ko:
게임 너튜버로 활동 중인 주인공 진혁은 유일하게
[시련의 탑]의 엔딩을 봤지만, 게임의 인기가 하락하며
더 이상 게임 너튜버로서의 삶도 유지하기 힘들어진다.

엔딩을 보았기에 이대로 게임을 마무리하려는 진혁.
바로 그날, [시련의 탑]은 현실이 되었다.
게임의 모든 요소를 다 알고 있는 진혁은
누구보다 빠르게 모든 것을 차지한다!

"진짜 고인물이 뭔지 보여주지."
description.ru:
Главный герой Джин Хек – игрок и стример, единственный, кто прошёл до конца «Башню испытаний».
Когда он увидел концовку игры, захотел бросить её. Но в тот же день «Башня испытания» стала реальностью. И главному герою не осталось ничего, кроме как показать, на что способен тот, кто знает все нюансы игры.

«Я покажу вам, что такое настоящий задрот!»
description.th: "จินฮยอก" สตรีมเมอร์หนุ่ม ผู้หลงใหลในการเล่นเกม ใช้เวลากว่า 11 ปี ในการบรรลุชั้นบนสุดของ '[หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] เกมแฟนตาซีเสมือนจริง' พอบรรลุเป้าหมายแล้ว จึงเกิดความคิดที่อยากจะล้มเลิกการเล่นเกม และการทำสตรีมมิ่ง แต่จู่ๆ วันหนึ่งเขาก็ตื่นมาพบว่า [หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] โผล่ขึ้นมาในชีวิตจริงซะอย่างนั้น!?
description.zh:
当游戏变为现实！
无名主播竟是唯一通关者！
男主镇赫是一名游戏主播，也是唯一一位“试炼之塔”游戏的通关玩家。随着“试炼之塔”这款游戏的热度下降，游戏主播的工作渐渐无法维持镇赫的生活。通关后的镇赫本想就此退游，然而游戏竟成为了现实。如果失败世界就会灭亡！对游戏了如指掌的镇赫还能在现实世界中通关吗？
description.pt-br: Jinhyuk, um viciado completo, foi o único a ter visto o final da [Torre dos Testes], mas à medida que a popularidade do jogo diminui, fica difícil manter a vida com o jogo. Jinhyuk quer terminar o jogo assim porque ele viu o final. Naquele mesmo dia, a [Torre dos Testes] se tornou uma realidade. Jinhyuk, que conhece todos os elementos do jogo, controla tudo mais rápido do que qualquer um! “Vou te mostrar o que é um profissional de verdade.”
description.zh-hk: 活躍於遊戲NewTube頻道的主角——振赫，他是唯一看過[試煉之塔]的結局，因為該款遊戲的人氣大跌，要經營NewTube頻道再也難以維持生計。 看完遊戲的結局後，原本振赫預計要結束不再玩遊戲。但就在當天，[試煉之塔]竟成為了現實。了解遊戲所有關卡的振赫，比誰都還要快占據所有物品。 「讓你見識什麼是真正的開掛高手。」

title.en: Maigo no Onnanoko o Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.ja: 迷子の女の子を家まで届けたら、玄関から出て来たのは学年一の美少女でした

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo no Onnanoko wo Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.en: When I Brought a Lost Girl Home, the Most Beautiful Girl in My Grade Came Out the Front Door
She Is the Beautiful Girl in the School Year

altTitles.vi: Đưa bé gái bị lạc trở về, người mở cửa là hoa khôi của khối

description.en:
One day, Kuroda Yusei, an introverted high school student with zero dating experience, returns a lost little girl to her house... when the most beautiful girl in his grade, Shirakawa Ayano, appears! 

"As thanks for saving my sister," she begins to approach him boldly for some reason, and every day is filled with mishaps!? On top of that, a busty otaku classmate and an attention-seeking junior girl also appear, and his daily life suddenly becomes more glamorous!? 

A school romance comedy where fate changes as you suddenly become close to "the girl of your dreams"!
description.ja:
恋愛経験ゼロの陰キャ高校生・黒田雄星がある日、迷子になっていた幼女を家まで届けると… 学年一の美少女・白河綾乃が出現!!

「妹を助けてくれたお礼に」と、なぜか彼女が大胆に迫ってくるようになり、毎日がハプニング状態!?
更に巨乳オタク同級生や、かまってちゃんな後輩女子も登場し、一気に華やかな日常に――!?

“憧れのあの子”と急接近して、運命が変わる学園ラブコメ！

altTitles.ja: この関係は合法です!

description.en:
YES Sister, NO Touch!

Kouta, who is extremely siscon, decides to live alone in order to "escape from his little sister ". One day, however, he picks up a runaway girl named Ui, who is full of younger sisterly feelings. Although she looks and acts like a child, she is in fact a beautiful 19-year-old girl with big tits!

Protect his sister? or Crossing the line? The days of agony begin!
description.ja: YESシスター、NOタッチ!?極度のシスコンの洸太は、「脱・妹」を目指し一人暮らしをすることに。だがある日、妹感満載の家出少女・初（うい）を拾ってしまう。顔もしぐさも幼い初だが、実は19歳の巨乳美少女だった！妹を守る？一線を超えちゃう!?悶々の日々が始まる！

title.en: Sono Akuyaku Kizoku, Mama Heroine ga Suki Sugiru ~Shinshi na Doryoku de Saikyou to Nari Fuguu na Oshi Chara Tasukemakuru~

altTitles.ja: その悪役貴族、ママヒロインが好きすぎる ～真摯な努力で最強となり不遇な推しキャラ助けまくる～

altTitles.en: The Villainous Noble Loves Mom Heroines Too Much ~Becoming The Strongest With Sincere Effort To Save Misfortunate Fave Chars~
That Villainous Aristocrat Is Actually Crazy About Mom Heroines ~With His Earnest Hard Work, He Becomes the Strongest and Saves All of His Favorite Characters~

description.en:
The mom characters that appear in the game are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. “Why… Why does such a cute mom have to die?!“ Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of MamaFan on a certain day. …However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who’s got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who’s crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!

---
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)

altTitles.ja-ro: Dejimon Furontia

altTitles.ja: デジモンフロンティア

altTitles.zh-hk: 數碼寶貝０４　無限地帶

description.en: The spirits of ten legendary warriors, who in ancient times had saved the Digiworld, now present a new power to the Digidestined! To save the Digiworld from evil, Takuya, Koji, Tommy, J.P and Zoe must band together as a team to find their chosen spirits! The journey into the new frontier - the Digimon Frontier - is about to begin!

title.en: Gyaru ni Koisuru 5 Byou Mae Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: ギャルに恋する５秒前 アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaru ni Koisuru Go Byou Mae Anthology Comic

altTitles.en: 5 Seconds Before Falling in Love with a Gyaru - Anthology Comics

description.en:
"You’re bound to fall in love when a gal is kind to you!". Despite dressing flamboyantly with a smidgin of lewdness sprinkle in, these gals occasionally show a pure side that will leave you mesmerized and-?

This is an Anthology collection of 6 chapters:
-Don’t seduce me, Sakihara-san! (by Kazawa Youhei)
-Kiyokawa-san is definitely a gyaru! (by saku)
-The gyaru childhood friend wants to give a warm welcome! (by Urano Ritsu)
-The gyaru likes ramen! (by Hidari Ude)
-Munching ♡ Kanna-chan ~A recipe for making gyaru fall in love with you~ (by Noki Kuzuri)
-The inexperienced gyaru asks for her teacher’s lessons (by Kamon Shoumi)

Cover illustration: Kazawa Youhei

Two lonely persons, two different fates. Him, a weak guy that suffers from albinism and permanent near-sighted. Her, an unwanted child, ostracized at school because she doesn't speak Vietnamese... In a twisted fate, they found themselves connected through Wi-Fi Network Names, but will their relationship last?

Omake arts done by [Flygombal](https://www.fiverr.com/zamrutzh)
Cover arts done by [Artiya](https://www.fiverr.com/kazisain)
description.vi: 2 con người F.A, 2 hoàn cảnh số phận hoàn toàn khác biệt. Thế mà chỉ vì tình cờ "giao tiếp" qua cái tên Wi-Fi ngẫu nhiên mà đến với nhau?

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

title.en: Becoming a Witch in a World Full of Monster Stories

altTitles.zh: 在充满怪谈的世界里成为魔女

altTitles.zh-ro: Zai Chongman Guaitan De Shijie Li Chengwei Monv
Zài Chōngmǎn Guàitán De Shìjiè Lǐ Chéngwéi Mónǚ

altTitles.en: Become a Witch in a World Full of Ghost Stories
Become an Enchantress in a World Full of Ghost Tales

description.en:
Day 1: Recently my eyes seem to be a bit off, always seeing strange things. Wait, the cabinet seems to be moving, I'll go check it out.
......
Day 13: I see them! Damn! Why is this world full of monsters!?
......
Day 101: There's nothing to be afraid of anymore! Donning a witch's gown, I've become a monster myself!
description.zh: Day1：最近我的眼睛好像有点儿不对劲，总是看见奇怪的东西。 等等，柜子好像动了，我去看一下。 Day13：我看见它们了！ 该死！这个世界怎么到处都是怪谈！？ …… Day101：已经没有什么好怕的了！ 穿上了魔女的长裙，我已经成为了怪谈！

title.en: Muhyo & Roji's Bureau of Supernatural Investigation

altTitles.en: Muhyo & Roji's Bureau of Supernatural Investigation
Muhyo and Roojii’s Magical Law Consultation Office

Muhyo to Roujii no Mahouritsu Soudan Jimusho
Muhyo to Rouji

Muhyo to Roji no Mahouritsu Soudan Jimusho
Muhyo to Roojii

description.en: Are you a victim of unwanted spirit possession? Is there a ghost you need sent up and away…or down to burn for all eternity? If the answer is yes, then you need Muhyo and Roji, experts in magic law. Serving justice to evil spirits is their specialty.

title.en: The Most Notorious "Talker" Runs the World's Greatest Clan

altTitles.ja: 最凶の支援職【話術士】である俺は世界最強クランを従える

altTitles.en: I'm the Most Evil Support Class【Talker】and I'll Subdue the Strongest Clan in the World

altTitles.vi: "Thánh Ngôn" khét tiếng nhất là người điều hành Clan vĩ đại nhất thế giới

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou no Shien-shoku "Wajutsushi" Dearu Ore wa Sekai Saikyou Kuran wo Shitagaeru

altTitles.es-la: Soy el Talker más Despiadado y Dominaré al Clan más Fuerte del Mundo

altTitles.vi: Tôi Là Thoại Thuật Sư Hỗ Trợ Cực Ác Dẫn Dắt Gia Tộc Mạnh Nhất Thế Giới

description.en:
Noel, a youth who admires his grandfather, who was hailed as a hero, and aspires to be the strongest Seeker. But his Job that appeared in the appraisal, was the support class Talker.

Talker is a peaky job with the weakest individual abilities. A job that could never become the strongest.

"If I create the strongest clan and become the clan master, then I’ll essentially be the strongest."

Thinking that, Noel worked hard persistently to fulfil his ambition. On the other hand, the merciless methods he employed for the sake of his ambition were acknowledged by everyone as the path of "evil." However, Noel’s distinct talent attracted many powerful people and they began to gather under him…

This is the story of how the most evil Talker, who seeks to be the strongest, subdues his allies and creates the strongest clan in the world.
description.vi: Đây là hành trình vươn tới đỉnh cao giới truy thủ của kẻ sinh ra mang trong mình một trong những chức nghiệp được đánh giá là yếu nhất - Noel Stollen.
description.es-la:
Noel, un joven que admira a su abuelo, que fue aclamado como un gran héroe, aspira a ser un buscador fuerte como él. Pero el trabajo que apareció en su evaluación, fue la clase de soporte “Talker” (Orador).

Talker es un trabajo con las habilidades individuales más débiles. Un trabajo que nunca podría convertirse en el más fuerte.

「Si creo el clan más fuerte y me convierto en el líder del clan, entonces esencialmente seré el más fuerte」

Pensando eso, y gracias al apoyo de su abuelo, Noel trabajó y entrenó arduamente por años con el objetivo de cumplir su ambición. Por otro lado, los métodos crueles que empleó por el bien de su ambición fueron reconocidos como inhumanos. Sin embargo, el talento distintivo de Noel atrajo a muchas personas poderosas y comenzaron a reunirse debajo de él...

Esta es la historia del Talker más despiadado que busca ser el más fuerte, forjando aliados para crear el clan más fuerte del mundo.

title.en: I Really Don't Want to Be Reborn

altTitles.en: I Really Don't Want to Remake

altTitles.vi: Ta Không Muốn Trùng Sinh Đâu

description.en:
Little had I known, I Chen Hansheng; the former elite of society and a Diamond Bachelor, was reborn. When I woke up, I was a senior graduate in high school? 
Later, Chen Hansheng was walking near the crosswalk, he seemed hesitant. A precious girl; Shen Youchu and two other girls; Bai Yueguang and Xiao Rongyu, who will he pick? All of them? One of them? Two of them? Read to find out. 

Side Note:  Diamond Bachelor is a slang word that means someone who’s insanely rich and single.

title.en: Otsubone Reijou to Shiyuka no Kisetsu - Reitetsu Saishou-sama no Okazari no Tsuma ni Natta Hazu ga, Dekiaisareteimasu

altTitles.ja: お局令嬢と朱夏の季節 〜冷徹宰相様のお飾りの妻になったはずが、溺愛されています〜

description.en:
Alellia, who has had her engagement broken off, is past the marriageable age, and is known behind her back as the "domineering female supervisor". She spends her days performing her duties as the right hand woman of Marquess Istilia Wegmund, "the cold-hearted prime minister."

One day, while performing her duties, the Prime Minister asks her to marry him.

Rumor has it that the Prime Minister is in love with another woman.
Alellia accepts the engagement, believing that she is being asked to enter into a contractual marriage.

A newly-married life with the cold-hearted prime minister begins...!

altTitles.ja-ro: Imouto ga Bun Retsu Shita.

altTitles.ja: 妹が分 裂した。

description.en:
After years of barely talking to her big brother, Uiha suddenly wakes up to find that she has a body-double, who is both her copy and her complete opposite.

---
[Alt. Raw](https://www.pixiv.net/user/209814/series/72439)
description.it: Dopo anni in cui Uiha non ha quasi mai rivolto la parola a suo fratello, un giorno si sveglia scoprendo di avere un suo clone tanto uguale a lei quanto completamente il suo opposto.

altTitles.ja: 「おかえり、パパ」

description.en: A high school girl is trying to get obsessively close to her kind stepdad. Even going as far as watching him in bed with her mom.
description.ru:
У женщины, на которой я женился, есть дочь. Её зовут Тоуко и она второкурсница старшей школы.
Я заволновался, когда узнал, что у меня появится дочь-подросток, но я рад, что, похоже, понравился ей.

Но был один странный момент, когда расстояние между нами стало слишком близким?..

"Пожалуйста, позаботься обо мне с этого момента, папа ♡"

Я уверен, что никто не знает, кто этот ребёнок на самом деле.
description.pt-br: A mulher com quem me casei tem uma filha, uma estudante do segundo ano chamada Toru Sakurako.  Fiquei preocupada quando soube que a filha dela ainda era uma garota do ensino médio, então fiquei feliz em ver que nos demos bem. Mas às vezes, Toru parecia chegar um pouco perto demais...?

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

altTitles.ja: 女神のカフェテラス

altTitles.ja-ro: Megami no Cafe Terrace
Megami no Kafeterasu

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

altTitles.ja: 運命だから諦めて？

altTitles.en: This Is Fate, So Give Up

altTitles.vi: Từ Bỏ Đi Đây Là Định Mệnh Rồi

description.en: Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?
description.pl: Bądź dobry lub idź do piekła. Warunki jego nowej klątwy wydają się wystarczająco proste dla niegdyś pełnego nadziei chuligana Jeonjiego Kima. A przynajmniej tak się wydaje, gdy pewnego dnia jego żwawy anioł stróż pojawia się na jego progu i leczy jego utykanie. Czy zwykłe pomaganie ludziom wystarczy, aby udobruchać małostkowego boga miejącego urazę?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

altTitles.ja: カドル ‐獣人オメガバース‐

description.en:
For the sake of those we love, we take turns to lie

Beryl, an omega who lost his husband and was burdened with debt, decides to have an arranged marriage with an aristocratic Alpha in order to protect the house of his memories.
However, the beautiful beastman Shia appears and sets out conditions for him to take his turn. To enter the same school, to become a servant,
And - good physical compatibility. Shia is arrogant and throws Beryl around, but he also has to protect him.
There's a reason... Also includes twin brother Hugo x servant Theo!

altTitles.ja: 仲良くしようねお隣さん

altTitles.ja-ro: Nakayoku Shiyoune Otonarisan

description.en:
A nightlife worker and a public server, two opposite poles living as neighbours. Before noticing it, they started spending time together and, unintentionally, they start caring for the other.

Mukojima, a police officer who has some suspicions towards his neighbour, lives alone in an apartment which reminds you of the Showa Era. One night, Mukojima faces a crisis inside his apartment and the one who came to his rescue was none other than Mikoshiba, his neighbour. By taking his invitation, Mukojima ends up in his neighbour’s apartment, where they share some drinks.

altTitles.ja: 廻天のアルバス

description.en:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But… it was too late.

Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. 

Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!
description.ja: 魔王を倒した。世界は平和に。でも、間に合わなかった。なぜかこの冒険を繰り返している勇者アルバスは、急ぎたい。これは世界を救う物語であり、そして――
description.vi:
Ma vương đã bị đánh bại... Thế giới sẽ hòa bình trở lại. Nhưng... Đã quá muộn rồi... Anh hùng Albus thật sự đang rất vội. Câu chuyện tua ngược, như thể một cách tự nhiên, trở lại nơi mọi chuyện khởi đầu.

Người anh hùng đầy hiểu biết Albus với đôi mắt lờ đờ như thiếu ngủ, dấn thân vào một cuộc phiêu lưu mới, nơi “thời gian là thứ quan trọng nhất”.

Được đăng dài kỳ trên Weekly Shounen Sunday, nơi đã đăng tải siêu phẩm “Thám tử lừng danh Conan”, người Anh hùng Albus tìm cách giành lại tương lai mà anh ấy mong muốn từ quá khứ trong thế giới fantasy “speedrun” một cách đúng nghĩa này!
description.es-la: El Rey Demonio es derrotado... El mundo está en paz. Pero fue demasiado tarde... El héroe Albus tiene prisa. La historia da vueltas y comienza de nuevo desde el principio, como si fuera algo natural. ¡Esta es una fantasía de re-aventura de alta velocidad donde "el tiempo es lo más importante" para el experto héroe Albus.

title.en: Papa x Papa - α To Ω De Sorezore Yattemasu

altTitles.ja: パパ×パパ~αとΩで夫夫やってます~

description.en:
Blue-collar omega Kosuke lives with his alpha author/homemaker husband, Haruka, and their two children, Marin and Yosuke. Between chores, child-rearing, and being an omega, Kosuke has his work cut out for him. But despite the difficulties and craziness of everyday life, each day is filled with joy, all thanks to Haruka’s overflowing love…!




A lovingly crafted Omegaverse Family BL about married life.
What I want is not a place to fit (in), but a place to eat

altTitles.ja-ro: Kokinya Nobunaga

altTitles.th: ยอดเชฟของโนบุนางะ

altTitles.ja: 信長のシェフ

description.en: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
description.ja: 現代の料理人・ケン。彼が目を覚ますとそこは戦国時代だった。京で評判の料理の噂を聞きつけた信長は、強引にケンを自分の料理人にするが…！？
description.es-la: Ken es un chef de la actualidad. Cuando se despierta, se encuentra en el período de los Estados en Guerra, la era Sengoku. Nobunaga oye un rumor sobre un plato con buena reputación en Kioto, y obliga a Ken a convertirse en su propio chef...
description.pt-br: Ken, um chef da era moderna, encontra-se de volta ao século 16, durante o período Sengoku. Sem qualquer lembrança de quem ele foi um dia ou como chegou ali, ele só pode contar com seu conhecimento e suas habilidades na culinárias. Mas, assim que ele ganha reputação por sua incrível comida, o próprio Oda Nobunaga aparece para demandar seus serviços.

title.en: Yoku Wakaranai Keredo Isekai ni Tensei Shiteita You Desu

altTitles.ja: よくわからないけれど異世界に転生していたようです

altTitles.en: This is Screwed Up, but I was Reincarnated as a GIRL in Another World!

altTitles.zh-hk: 雖然不太清楚，不過我好像轉生到異世界了

altTitles.id: Saya tidak begitu mengerti, tapi sepertinya saya bereinkarnasi di dunia lain

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Con Gái, Tôi Sẽ Sinh Tồn Tại Dị Giới

altTitles.en: I Don't Really Get It, but It Looks like I Was Reincarnated in Another World

description.en:
Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her. Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist – and a grown man! As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth's science as well as her newfound powers! Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?
___
**Character Designer:** [Kaoming](https://mangadex.org/author/259d2f17-2e24-4346-aca8-1ecd2224c491)
description.ja:
「私、おっさんだった！！」

孤児の少女・レンは身売りされる途中で、前世の記憶を取り戻す。レンの前世は、三十代の男性研究者だったが、転生して今まで孤児として生きていたのであった。レンは、その身に秘められた魔法の才能と、前世の科学的知識を駆使して、ひとり過酷な異世界を生き抜いていく。

title.en: Sweet Home Mofumofu Tanuki Kyoudai to Kazoku ni Narimasu

altTitles.ja: 社畜リーマン、兄弟たぬきと家族になる
スイートホーム もふもふたぬき兄弟と家族になります

altTitles.ja-ro: Shachiku Riiman, Kyoudai Tanuki to Kazoku ni Naru

altTitles.en: The Corporate Slave Becomes Family with The Tanuki Brothers

description.en:
The corporate slave meets a pair of fluffy brothers?!
Hinata Chihiro is the so-called “corporate slave” who works for a black company. Today, after buying a convenience store box meal, as usual, he arrived home late at night just to find a lost kid wandering near his house?! Chihiro then welcomes the adorable small tanuki, Rio, and his tsundere older brother who hates humans, Itta. And that’s how his life with the fluffy tanuki brothers, who were driven out of their natural habitat, begins…!
description.pt-br: O escravo corporativo conhece um par de irmãos fofos?! Hinata Chihiro é a chamada “escrava corporativa” que trabalha para uma empresa negra. Hoje, depois de comprar uma caixa de refeição de loja de conveniência, como de costume, ele chegou em casa tarde da noite apenas para encontrar uma criança perdida vagando perto de sua casa?! Chihiro então dá as boas-vindas ao adorável pequeno tanuki, Rio, e seu irmão mais velho tsundere que odeia os humanos, Itta. E é assim que começa sua vida com os fofos irmãos tanuki, que foram expulsos de seu habitat natural…!

title.en: The Political Broadcast of the Onee-Sho-Tou Party (Tokyo Governor Election)

altTitles.ja: おねショ夕党の政見放送(東亰都知事選

altTitles.ja-ro: Onee-Sho-Tou no Seiken Housou (Toukyou Tochijisen)

title.en: Teisou Gyakuten Isekai de Sukebe na Bijo-tachi ni Kakomare nagara Boukensha Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 貞操逆転異世界でスケベな美女たちに囲まれながら冒険者生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Teisou Gyakuten Isekai de Sukebe na Bijo Tachi ni Kakoma re Nagara Bouken Mono Seikatsu
Teisō Gyakuten Isekai de Sukebena Bijo-Tachi ni Kakoma Renagara BōKen-sha Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Chastity reversal: An adventurer's life surrounded by lascivious beauties in a different world
An adventurer's life surrounded by lewd beauties in a chastity-reversed parallel world

description.en:
From Google Translate:

Akira Kusaba is summoned to the other world of Rumisia by the beautiful silver-haired woman Lucia. Akira wasn't summoned to save the world... but to help her make money!? Feeling exhausted, Akira begins working part-time in the other world, but gradually he notices the strangeness of this world. There's a female adventurer who wants to have her breasts wiped by a man, a slime that tries to drain the vitality out of men, and even Lucia, who summoned him, forces him to sleep next to her and secretly enjoys solo play in the bed next to her... Yes, this other world is a world where the concepts of chastity between men and women are reversed!
description.ja: 銀髪の美女ルーシャによって異世界ルミシアへと召喚された草場アキラ。アキラが召喚されたのは世界を救うため……ではなく、金稼ぎの手伝いのため!?脱力しながらも異世界バイト生活を始めたアキラだったが、次第にこの世界のおかしさに気づく。男性におっぱいを拭かれたがる女冒険者に男性の精気を搾り取ろうとするスライム、果ては自分を召喚したルーシャですら、添い寝を強要したり隣のベッドでこそこそソロプレイで気持ちよくなったり――。そう、この異世界は男女の貞操観念が逆転した世界だったのだ！

description.ar: بايك قيهو الذي يحب السماء أكثر من الناس، لذا كل ما تلتقطه كاميراته هو السماء. في أحد أيام الصيف، تنتقل فتاة تدعى "هانيول" والذي يعني اسمها "سماء" إلى صف قيهو لتجلس بجانبه.
description.en: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

title.en: Breaking Into The Body of The Emperor's Daughter

description.en:
After transmigrating to another world as a wealthy young master, Su Changqing only wanted to live a low-profile life as a rich second-generation heir and enjoy his days in comfort. However, his plans are suddenly disrupted when his family faces an unexpected crisis, and he accidentally discovers the Emperor's secret - that she is actually a woman.

While he initially feared the female Emperor would stop at nothing to silence him, to his surprise, she instead becomes interested in his mysterious ability to transform his appearance. She wants him to become her male body double. What Su Changqing never expected was that being the female Emperor's male substitute would mean he has to visit the imperial harem on his very first day. His peaceful life completely falls apart from that moment on...

title.en: Mori de Seijo wo Hirotta Saikyou no Kyuuketsu-hime Musume no Tamenara Kuni de Moassari Horoboshimasu!

altTitles.ja: 森で聖女を拾った最強の吸血姫～娘のためなら国でもあっさり滅ぼします！～@COMIC

altTitles.en: The Strongest Vampire Princess Who Found and Adopted the Baby Saint in the Forest: I'll Even Destroy a Country for My Daughter!

description.en:
The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "the Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today.
The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter?!
After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption.
Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection.
One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter, Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath!
The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means!

A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection!

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.vi: Isekai làm người quản lý tháp

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

title.ja: Saijo no Osewa Takane no Hana-darakena Meimon-kou de, Gakuin Ichi no Ojou-sama (Seikatsu Nouryoku Kaimu) wo Kagenagara Osewa suru Koto ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 才女のお世話 高嶺の花だらけな名門校で、学院一のお嬢様（生活能力皆無）を陰ながらお世話することになりました

altTitles.en: I Was Assigned to Take Care of the Most Talented Young Lady (With No Life Skills) at a Prestigious School Full of High Achievers

altTitles.vi: Làm Bảo Mẫu Cho Tiểu Thư

description.en: A poor high school boy, Izuki Tomonari, got caught up in a kidnapping attempt on Hinako Konohana, a young lady from one of Japan's largest conglomerates. On the surface, Hinako appears to be a brilliant and beautiful young woman, but in reality, she is a lazy girl with no life skills. However, due to family reasons, Hinako has to play the role of the "perfect young lady" at school. Wanting to protect her, Izuki took on the job of caring for her. Eventually, Hinako began to spoil Izuki with all her might. "I don't want... Izuki to leave my side right now." This is a love story that begins beyond the master-servant relationship featuring a princess with a beautiful facade.
description.ja: 男子高校生・友成伊月は、誘拐に巻き込まれたことが切っ掛けで、日本随一の財閥のお嬢様・此花雛子のお世話係をすることに。 表向きは才色兼備な雛子だが、その正体は生活能力皆無のぐうたら娘だった。しかし、家の都合で、学院では「完璧なお嬢様」を演じなければならない雛子。そんな彼女を守りたいと思い、甲斐甲斐しく世話を焼く伊月。やがて雛子も伊月に全力で甘えてくるようになって――「今は……伊月が傍にいない方が、嫌」ギャップ可愛いお嬢様との主従を越えて始まる恋物語。
description.pt-br: O estudante do ensino médio Itzuki Tomonari se envolveu em um sequestro e se viu lidando com Konohana Hinako, a herdeira do maior conglomerado do Japão. Hinako parece ser uma jovem inteligente e bonita, mas sua verdadeira identidade é preguiçosa, sem capacidade para viver sozinha. No entanto, devido às circunstâncias em casa, Hinako tem que interpretar a "ojou-sama perfeita" na academia. Uma história de amor que começa além de mestre-servo com uma linda jovem.

altTitles.ja: ファイアパンチ

description.en:
In the not-too-distant past, the Ice Witch blanketed the world in snow, starvation and madness, leading the inhabitants to seek their salvation in fire. With that, an unusual destiny unfolds for two young orphans, Agni and Luna, blessed with the ability to regenerate. But will this ability prove to be more of a curse than a blessing?

Nominee for the 2017 Manga Taisho Award.
description.ru: Людей рождающихся с даром называют одарёнными. Для кого-то это благословение, для некоторых проклятье. Проклятьем для всех остальных сделала свой дар Ведьма Льда. Повелевая холодом она забрала у мира всё и оставила лишь голод, снег и безумие.
description.uk: У недалекому минулому Льодяна відьма вкрила світ снігом, голодом і божевіллям, змушуючи людей шукати притулок у вогні. Незвичайна доля складається для двох маленьких сиріт Аґні та Луни, які були наділені здібністю до відродження. Але прокляттям, чи благословенням стане ця здібність?

altTitles.ja: ブトゥーム

description.en:
Sakamoto Ryouta is an unemployed 22-year-old who lives with his mother. In the real world, there may be nothing really special about him, but online, he's one of the world's top players of the combat game "BTOOOM"!  
  
One day, he awakes in what appears to be a tropical island, though he has no memory of how or why he has come to be there. While wandering around, Ryouta sees someone and calls out for help. The stranger responds by throwing a bomb at him! Now Ryouta realizes both that his life is in danger, and that he has somehow been trapped in a real-life version of his favorite game! Will Ryouta be able to survive long enough to figure out how and why he ended up here?  
  


---
description.ru:
Сакамото Рёта — 22-летний безработный, игрок мирового уровня в популярную командную боевку «Btooom!». То, что он при этом сидит на шее у матери, парня не волнует, мыслями он всецело в виртуальном мире, где крут, беспощаден и неотразим. Только в наше время до виртуальной реальности далеко — в этом Рёта убедился на своей шкуре, очнувшись в джунглях, крепко избитый, с чужой сумкой и полным сумбуром в голове. В общем, вышло так, что чья-то злая воля закинула на необитаемый остров несколько десятков игроков и предложила им сразиться в «Btooom!» вживую и по-крупному. Без оружия, без доспехов — только ручные бомбы, собственные тела и гражданская одежда. Как говорится — естественный отбор!  
  
Но истинного игрока королевской битвой смутить сложно, особенно когда на кону собственная жизнь. Так что вскоре Рёта отбросил интеллигентские сопли и приготовился, как не столь далекие предки, жить по принципу «или ты, или тебя». Главное — выжить, а там уже можно пофилософствовать о смысле бытия и вдоволь поспорить с сердечной подругой Химико — за что им досталась такая участь? Как говорят: не согрешишь — не покаешься, не покаешься — не спасешься. А еще на острове можно повидать новые места, насладиться прекрасной природой, встретить много интересных людей… и убить их!  
  


---

altTitles.ja: 暗黒デルタ

altTitles.ja-ro: Ankoku Deruta

description.en:
In the otherworldly city of Delta, its grotesque residents sustain themselves by consuming human energy...!

This gritty, action-packed tale marks the first full series from the up-and-coming talent who captivated audiences with the one-shots “Death Salmon Hunter” and “Composter Funeral”!
description.ja: 人間たちの知らない、もうひとつの世界に存在する都市・デルタ。異形の者たちが住まうその都市では人間から吸い出したエネルギーが生活の全てを支え、最も価値のある物とされていた。住人のオーロラもエネルギーを集めて暮らしていたが、自分たちとは異なる価値観を持つ人間世界に興味津々！
